CustomField.description: (Steel price + handling cost + delivery cost) * 1.25 + License plate cost + registration cost
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Prev. formula: licensePlateCost__c + Final_tax_after_deduction__c + (Sixt_steel_purchase_price__c + Delivery_cost__c + handlingCost__c) * 1.25
CustomField.label: Tax Base
